name: Croovsko - PGA version
description:
Game created by DeepShift Games.

Croovsko connects classic 2D platformer with innovative and full of action method of moving around. 

Play as mutated cow which shoots milk from her udders! This is both your way to fly around the map and collect points. 

You can control cow with gamepad (recommended) or with mouse.

Gamepad controls:

  • left stick - rotation
  • right bumper - shoot

Mouse controls:

  • mouse - rotation
  • LPM - shoot
